page.title: 03TRANSPORT
page.content:
We did a traffic count through Selattyn in our Domesday area, we worked out the average number of vehicles per hour. . These are the categories we decided on 1. car/van 2 lorry/boxvan 3. bus/coach 4. motor bike 5.tractor/JCB 6. bike 7. horse .
These are the averages we worked out,
The average of cars in one hour was 26, the average for lorries in one hour is 3, the average for buses in one hour is 2, there was a third of a tractor per hour. The average number of the vehicles passing through Selattyn in an hour was 32 and 2 thirds.
